join.

Are either / both of you able to join? No problem if not, I can just receive the update, but great if you're around. If all 
of us can do it, I'll switch the invite from my number to conference line (I need a login reset for my 
USAVoice account otherwise I'd use mine).

Gloria, 
We were wondering if you or your colleagues have been able to reach any of the clients we discussed last week? It 
would be very helpful to know their views and reactions shortly —  and we're of course happy to speak with them 
directly as well if that would be helpful. 
thanks,

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, March 25, 2020 1:55 PM 
To: Gloria Allred < 
Cc: 
Subject: Call this week 
Gloria, 
Would you have time for a call with the SONY Epstein team tomorrow or Friday? We would like to provide you 
with a bit of an update and discuss some of your clients in particular. 
Hope you are staying safe and healthy. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007
